trigger.expression: {Template App bind9 - log:script.bind.1.last()}=1 and {Template App bind9 - log:log[/var/log/named.log,,,,skip,].count(60,"couldn't add command channel","like")}>0
trigger.name: bind: named.log - couldn't add command channel

trigger.expression: {Template App bind9 - log:script.bind.1.last()}=1 and {Template App bind9 - log:log[/var/log/named.log,,,,skip,].count(60,"error","like")}>0
trigger.name: bind: named.log - error message detected

trigger.expression: {Template App bind9 - log:script.bind.1.last()}=1 and {Template App bind9 - log:log[/var/log/named.log,,,,skip,].count(60,"warning","like")}>0
trigger.name: bind: named.log - warning message detected
{HOST.NAME} - Bind is not running
trigger.description: Bind is not running Check named
